articles.description: Elliott continues to impress on loan in the Championship as he netted another fine strike on Wednesday with Jurgen Klopp now eyeing a greater first-team role for the youngster next season
articles.content:
There seems to be little stopping Harvey Elliott's rapid rise to Premier League stardom.

articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti updates Yerry Mina recovery timeframe but confirms double Everton injury boost - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Carlo Ancelotti has given an injury update on his Everton squad ahead of Southampton's trip to Goodison Park on Monday including Dominic Calvert-Lewin, Allan and Yerry Mina
articles.content:
Carlo Ancelotti has confirmed that both Allan and Dominic Calvert-Lewin will be fit to start for Everton when Southampton visit Goodison Park on Monday.

articles.author: Kieran Jackson
articles.title: England coach Eddie Jones admits he made a 'mistake' in World Cup final defeat to South Africa - Daily Mail
articles.description: After Jones picked exactly the same starting XV for the final, Owen Farrell and Co couldn't reach the heights of the week before and slumped to a 32-12 defeat at the hands of the Springboks
articles.content:
Eddie Jones admits he made a 'mistake in retrospect' in his team selection for England's loss to South Africa in the final of the 2019 Rugby World Cup.
